Package etomica.graphics

Class Display

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.graphics.Display
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DisplayBox, DisplayPlot, DisplayPolytope, DisplayTable, DisplayTextBox, DisplayTextBoxesCAE

    public abstract class Display
extends java.lang.Object
    Superclass of all classes that display something from the simulation. Included are displays of graphical and tabular data, and views of the molecules as they move about during the simulation.

    • Method Detail

      • graphic

        public abstract java.awt.Component graphic​()
        Method of Simulation.GraphicElement interface. Default action is to return this Display (which is a Panel) as the graphic object. May override in subclass to return a more appropriate graphical element, or none at all.

      • getLabel

        public java.lang.String getLabel​()
